actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act for the purposes of determining the eligibility and suitability of designating a segment of the New River as a national wild and scenic river.
short_title: New River Wild and Scenic Study Act of 1992

summary.text: New River Wild and Scenic Study Act of 1992 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the New River in West Virginia and Virginia as a study river for possible inclusion in the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: New River Wild and Scenic Study Act of 1992
A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act for the purposes of determining the eligibility and suitability of designating a segment of the New River as a national wild and scenic river.
